data.title: Vaijayanthi Srinivasaraghavan on LinkedIn: #ibm #proudibmer #gratitute #thankyouall
data.meta_description:
My 18 +years with IBM #ibm journey with IBM coming to an end today… IBM gave me a professional home. 
Thank you IBM !!! my managers, the leadership and… | 243 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
It was an absolute pleasure and honor to be part of NASSCOM Women Tech & Product Roadshow held at IIT-Research Park. Chennai on 28th June 2024 as a panel moderator for the track - Leading the Charge to bridge the Gender Gap with strong Male Allies Thanks to the panelist Balaji V Rams Parameswaran Biswajit Panda for making the session interesting and engaging. Thank you NASSCOM for giving us the wonderful opportunity. Shreya Sharma @prashant verma Khushbu Gupta Krithikaa Chandramouli Guhan R S #nasscom #maleallies #womenintechnology #ups #UPSITC

I am thrilled to share that today marks my one-year work anniversary at UPS India Technology center. This past year has been an incredible journey filled with growth, learning, and countless memorable moments. I want to express my heartfelt gratitude to each one of you for your support, guidance, and camaraderie. Working alongside such a talented and dedicated team has been an enriching experience, and I am grateful for the opportunities to collaborate and contribute to our shared goals. As I look forward to the future, I am excited about the possibilities and confident that we will continue to achieve great things together. Thank you to my UPS colleagues and leadership team. These accomplishments would not have been possible without the collective efforts from my family. Bala Subramanian (CDTO), Dr. Subramani Ramakrishnan Ciji S Kalpesh Gupta MaheshKumar Subbaiah Manavalan Muthusamy Arockiam Philomin Raj Sivanesan Harry Bolton, MBA Hardik Bharucha Mubeen Ahmed Karthik Duddala Pradeep J. Charan Kumar Shetty K Ayyappan Paramasivam Christina Struller da Costa Fungai Sakaike Eric Hayes Alp Kayabasi Kavitha Rao Cindy Chan Won Suk Lee Satyan Parameswaran Peta Parkinson Sandhiya Karuna Marlin Deva Komal Patil Caroline Wanjiru Kiunga Jinu Chrispin Jove Lovely Raj Vimal Kumar SethuramanRupinderjit Singh Batra Chandar Ratnam Srividhya Sireesh Adithya (Adi) S. Neeraja Sundar Dr. Sundar Parthasarathy Madhavan Jagannathan Sudarshan Gopaladesikan Ray S. Sriram Jagannathan Michaela Brezinova #ups #oneyear #technology #youbelongatUPS Celebrating my work anniversary. Feeling thankful for this #workmilestone
